verse.name: v1
verse.lines: This is my prayer in the desert newline When all that's within me feels dry newline This is my prayer in my hunger and need newline My God is the God who provides

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: This is my prayer in the fire newline In weakness or trial or pain newline There is a faith proved of more worth than gold newline So refine me Lord through the flame

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I will bring praise newline I will bring praise newline No weapon formed against me shall remain newline I will rejoice newline I will declare newline God is my victory and He is here

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: This is my prayer in the battle newline When triumph is still on his way newline I am a conqueror and co-heir with Christ newline So firm on His promise I'll stand

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: All of my life in every season newline You are still God newline I have a reason to sing newline I have a reason to worship

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: This is my prayer in the harvest newline When favor and providence flow newline I know I'm filled to be emptied again newline The seed I've received I will sow
